  • Constructor Details

    • PuttingSimulator

      public PuttingSimulator​(PuttingCourse _course, PhysicsEngine _engine)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      _course - PuttingCourse, the course to play on
      _engine - PhysicsEngine, the physics engine used for calculations

  • Method Details

    • take_shot

      public void take_shot​(Vector2d initial_ball_velocity, boolean useWhileLoop)
      Take a shot
      Parameters:
      initial_ball_velocity - Vector2d, the velocity of the ball when the shot is taken
      useWhileLoop - boolean, set to true if shot should be calculated completely, or false when only one time step should be calculated.

    • calcWin

      public boolean calcWin​(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2d position, @NotNull @NotNull Vector2d flagPos, double clearance)
      Calculate if ball is in the hole
      Parameters:
      position - Vector2d, position of ball
      flagPos - Vector2d, position of flag
      clearance - double, clearance > 0.1, number that radius around hole will be divide by, to have ai aim better
      Returns:
      boolean, true when ball is in hole, false otherwise

    • act_timestep_from_distance

      public Vector2d act_timestep_from_distance()
      Allows graphics engine to execute a time step
      Returns:
      Vector2d, ball position after time step was executed
